Detailed Description

Persistent Document of the "Bookmarks Book".

Considered using just one notification instead of seven, using userInfo to identify which timestamp to update. But since I need to coalesce on name to reduce the number of notifications, this would, for example, coalesce 'sorted' and 'unsorted' into one notification instead of having the 'unsorted' be first in/out of the queue and 'sorted' last in/out of the queue as desired.

Member Function Documentation

- (void) addOrRemoveStarkPerValueOfHasForSharype: (Sharype)  sharype  

Reads the current value of hasBar, hasMenu, hasUnfiled or hasOhared for the receiver's config, compares this to whether or not the receiver's managed object context actually has the relevant stark, and if necessary adds or deletes the relevant stark so that it actually has what the config says it's supposed to have or not have.

If a stark with children is removed, an error is logged.

Parameters:
sharype The sharype of the stark to be possibly added or removed. Must be one of SharypeBar, SharypeMenu, SharypeUnfiled or SharypeOhared.

- (BmxBkConfig*) config  

Fetches the single instance of the 'config' managed object from the receiver's managed object context.

The document's 'config' is a container for all of the "internal metadata"; everything except the starks.

- (Stark *) defaultParentForStark: (Stark*)  item  

Returns the default parent which should adopt a give stark that cannot be adopted by its desired parent.

Parameters:
item The proposed child

- (void) findDupesThreaded: (BOOL)  threaded  

If findDupes is necessary, finds duplicates among the receiver's starks, obeying the duplicate-finding rules given in the receiver's configuration.

Necessity is determined by comparing the timestamps lastFoundDupes and lastUnfoundDupes of the receiver's configuration.

Parameters:
threaded If YES, the necessary operations are placed into the application's operation queue and this method returns immediately.  If no, the operation blocks the calling thread and returns when complete.

- (void) sort  

If sorting is necessary, sorts all of the receiver's starks, obeying sorting rules given in the receiver's configuration.

Necessity is determined by comparing the timestamps lastSorted and lastUnsorted of the receiver's configuration.

- (IBAction) syncIn: (id)  sender  

Performs the Sync In command.

Syncs in bookmark items from the external store by performing all internalizers arrayed in the receiver's config

- (IBAction) syncOut: (id)  sender  

Performs the Sync Out command.

Syncs out bookmark items to the external store by performing all externalizers arrayed in the receiver's config
